sub_title: Global Executive VP | Managing Director | Change Manager | Country Manager | Commercial Director
summary:
It is my ambition and motivation to select, lead, motivate and develop (international) teams to grow and conquer new and existing markets together in a joyful and pleasant working environment with the aim to secure the best results for our clients and our company.

I believe in a strong vision and strategy, with defined goals and analytical approach with a decision making process based on facts. I have a transparent and open minded approach to get the best out of the knowledge and diversity of my teams. Creating exiting and challenging no-nonsense environments where we can combine hard work and hands on approach with pleasure and fun. Perseverance and teamspirit will be evident.

As an international experienced business leader (20+ years), I have driving growth and profits, launching new services, and growing new/existing markets across various countries and continents. My focus is based on a commercial, financial and people first mindset. I have expertise and proven results in turning around bad performing units globally.

With my family I lived and worked in various locations in Europe (UK, Netherlands, Germany, Belgium), Americas (Houston, TX) and Asia Pacific (Singapore) and experienced in managing clients and employees in various cultures.

I have work experience and client/employee contacts within various sectors like Oil & Gas, Maritime, Renewable Energy, Automotive, Process Industry, Food & Beverage, Healthcare, and other.

My knowledge and expertise is coming from 20+ years in Profit & Loss responsibility and growing units, countries and divisions of around 500+ employees and over 100 mUSD revenues annually in the professional technical services industry, and specifically the Testing, Inspection and Certification (TIC) sector.

My Masters Degree in Business Economics from Erasmus University Rotterdam is supplemented with executive management programs at Harvard Business School (Strategic Marketing Management), IMD (Management Development), and Bocconi School of Management (Mergers & Acquisitions). 

I developed specific knowledge in professional service delivery in the areas of Quality-, Safety-, Environmental-, Sustainability Management, Risk Management and Corporate Governance/Compliance.  

My family and I are very mobile, and willing to commute or relocate to working locations in the world.  

If interested, please contact me via email: richard.stolk@yahoo.com or via mobile: +31-6-11291757 (GMT+1)
